name: Replay the Game
description:
Replay the Game is a cynically comedic puzzle/exploration game which parodies usage of the video game trope of "death" by forcing the player to utilize their failures to get through each area. When the player inevitably dies in an attempt to pass through each area, they are presented with a comedic anecdote about their death.

Replay the Game is about creativity.

Replay the Game is about life.

Replay the Game is about death.

Replay the Game is about trying at every problem, and refusing to give up at all costs.
